section.name: Consulting or Professional Support
section.p: It is very sad that all materials on our web site, stackoverflow.com knowledge and mail-list do not help you. If there is something that could be improved in Checkstyle's documentation to make Checkstyle the easiest tool to use - please let our team know.

If your company or organization requires:
- personal consulting on how to introduce Checkstyle into your company process,
- help in introducing Checkstyle to legacy projects,
- help in developing company's personal code convention/style,
- help in eliminating Job security by enforcing code standards/style and static code analysis,
- prioritized handling of bugs/issues,
- prioritized handling of enhancement requests,
- ....
Please do not hesitate to contact me (Roman Ivanov) by email, you can find my email in git commits.
